```{r}

# install.packages("tidyverse")
# install.packages("tidylog")
# install.packages("here")
library(tidyverse)
library(tidylog)
library(here)
```

```{r}
df_qualtrics_raw <- read_csv(here("data/raw/LLM_LargeStudy_Nov24_December 3, 2024_10.56.csv"))
df_scenarios_1_raw <- read_csv(here("final_scenarios_pt1.csv"))
df_scenarios_2_raw <- read_csv(here("final_scenarios_pt2.csv"))
```


```{r}

df_scenarios_1 <- df_scenarios_1_raw %>% 
  rename_all(~paste0(., "_pt1")) 

df_scenarios_2 <- df_scenarios_2_raw %>% 
  rename_all(~paste0(., "_pt2"))

df_qualtrics <- df_qualtrics_raw %>% 
  full_join(df_scenarios_1, by = c("PROLIFIC_PID" = "pid_pt1")) %>%
  full_join(df_scenarios_2, by = c("PROLIFIC_PID" = "pid_pt2"))
  
```

```{r}
df_qualtrics %>% 
  write_csv(here("data/proc/qualtrics_and_chatbot.csv"))
```
